definition: to collapse/to fall into ruins/death of king or emperor/demise
to be dispersed/to break down/to fester/to ulcerate

sentences.english: After all, sitting and waiting is how we made money from the subprime debacle.
sentences.chinese: 畢竟，我們如何從次貸崩潰賺錢就是坐着等待。

sentences.english: Breeding and management programs for beef cattle fell apart.
sentences.chinese: 肉牛的飼養和管理計劃也崩潰了。

sentences.english: This sequence of function calls shows you the path to the crash.
sentences.chinese: 這個函數調用序列顯示了造成崩潰的代碼路徑。

sentences.english: I've been tasked with psychoanalyzing Jack after his mental breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 我一直在負責對崩潰後的傑克使用精神分析療法。

sentences.english: The strong pressure of public opinion has caused her nervous breakdown.
sentences.chinese: 強大的輿論壓力導致了她的精神崩潰。

sentences.english: Gordon G. Chang is the author of The Coming Collapse of China.
sentences.chinese: 章家敦是《中國即將崩潰》一書的作者。

sentences.english: It is the collapsing of the Expander that triggers the Adorer clean up code.
sentences.chinese: 這是崩潰的膨脹觸發崇拜者清理代碼。

sentences.english: He simply fell apart on hearing his son's death.
sentences.chinese: 聽到兒子的死訊，他頹然崩潰了。

sentences.english: Assuming the whole world economy doesn't come crashing down – which isnot out of the realm of possibilities.
sentences.chinese: 假設全球經濟不會崩潰，但這幾乎是不可能的。

sentences.english: Argentine debacle has important lessons to teach.
The answer came like a bolt of thunder and the merchant was devastated.
sentences.chinese: 這回答象一聲炸雷，富翁徹底崩潰了。

sentences.english: Such debacles usually start, Edward has found, with a compelling growth story.
sentences.chinese: 錢塞勒發現，此類崩潰通常以引人注目的增長爲起點。

sentences.english: The answer is that they appropriated much of the wealth of a collapsing superpower.
sentences.chinese: 答案是他們侵吞了一個崩潰的超級大國的大量財富。

sentences.english: The speed and ferocity of the Lehman Brothers crisis brought the world to the brink of a meltdown.
sentences.chinese: 雷曼兄弟危機的快速和兇猛將世界帶到了崩潰的邊緣。

sentences.english: Certainly, the crash of your organization's commerce Web site is a big deal.
sentences.chinese: 當然，組織的商業網站崩潰是個大問題。

definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
to grieve/to be broken-hearted/to feel deeply hurt
